content.query:
CREATE DATABASE APPDB;  

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD='Hithvik@100'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken 
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE'
,SECRET='sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwlacupx&se=2023-05-07T17:27:21Z&st=2023-05-07T09:27:21Z&spr=https&sig=VFtoqmymDdf0FcV97i8p0PYsomghlXIAgKXmySFliII%3D'

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE LOG_DATA 
WITH (LOCATION='https://stgdl102.blob.core.windows.net/folder1',
    CREDENTIAL=SasToken)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TextFileFormat WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,  
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        FIRST_ROW = 2))

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [emp_s] (
    [EMPNO] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[ENAME] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[JOB] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[MGR] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[HIREDATE] [date] NULL,
	[SAL] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[COMM] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[DEPTNO] [varchar](200)  NULL	
)
WITH( 
LOCATION='./Emp.csv',
DATA_SOURCE=log_data,
FILE_FORMAT=TextFileFormat
)


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata]
(
    [Correlation id] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Operation name] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Event category] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [datetime] NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Event initiated by] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resource type] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resource group] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL)
WITH (
 LOCATION = '/Log.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = log_data,  
    FILE_FORMAT = TextFileFormat
)

select *from logdata;
select *from [emp_s];
